law.catch_line: Executive secretary and assistants -- Expenditure of funds.
law.text: The board may employ an executive secretary and such clerical or other assistants as are necessary for the proper performance of its work and may make expenditures of its funds for any purpose which in the opinion of the board is necessary for proper performance of its duties, including compensation of the executive secretary and the premium on his bond.
law.history: Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1986.
